mention.text: the Russian republic of Crimea and Sevastopol
The Russian Republic of Crimea and Sevastopol
the government in search for the winning road map
Long-term tax exemptions for new enterprises
necessary prerequisites in the grand scheme
the special economic zone on the peninsula
One of the potential novelties under discussion
the creation of a so called civilized offshore zone that allows litigation under British jurisdiction with mutual consent as well as in Russian arbitration courts
residents who invest directly into the peninsula and portfolio investors with local profit centers for investment outside Crimea
retailers from there as well , and most of whom have good standing with us
